responses: Hi there, how can I help?

patterns: where is Shivaji s. Jondhale college of engineering and technology located?
responses: College is located at 5 minutes walking distance from Asangoan station

patterns: what are the affiliation of college
which university college is affiliated to?,
responses: Shivajirao S. Jondhle College Of Engineering & Technology, Asangaon established in the year 2007-08 with the intake capacity of 240 students. The institute is approved by AICTE, New Delhi; Recognized by DTE, Government of Maharashtra and Affiliated to University of Mumbai

patterns: what programs are offered by the college
responses: UG Programme: CIVIL ENGINEERING,COMPUTER ENGINEERING,ELECTRONICS & TELECOMMUNICATION ENGINEERING,MECHANICAL ENGINEERING & PG Programme: MASTER OF ENGINEERING (CONSTRUCTION ENGINEERING & MANAGEMENT), MASTER OF ENGINEERING (ENERGY SYSTEMS & MANAGEMENT)

patterns: which facilities are there in college
responses: Library, Gymkhana, Auditorium/seminar halls, Canteen, Language lab, Computer centre, Medical lab

patterns: which companies visit college for placements
which companies come to hire students
responses: Some recruiters that visited our campus are: Reliance Jio, Runwall Group, Godrej and Bouyce, Seed Infotech and many more

patterns: how can i apply for admission
responses: Eligibility for admission is as per the criteria laid by the State Common Entrance Test cell, Maharashtra State. please refer www.mahacet.org for the documents required for admission

patterns: how much fee i need to pay
responses: The fee will be charged as fixed by Fee Regulating Authority
To know about Scholarship schemes please contact main office
